attributes.action: To stand againt the Recognition of Jerusalem / Al Quds as the capital of Israel.
attributes.additional_details:
In 1917, during World War I, the British capture Palestine from the Ottomans and, in the Balfour Declaration of November 2, promise the Jews a "national home" there.

Opposition from the Palestinians first emerges at a congress in Jerusalem in 1919.

In 1922, the League of Nations sets out the obligations of a British mandate in Palestine, including securing "establishment of the Jewish national home", the future Israel.

Great Britain was involved in the destruction Of Palestine and Aided Crime.
attributes.background: Donald Trump has stated that he has recognised Jerusalem as the capital of Israel and plans to move the Embassy to Jerusalem to aid the the Israeli in becoming an State. Israel is in clear Violation of Human rights. It is in Occupation of Palestine’s land and is not their rightful Country.
